1.name: §a§lTurret
1.description:
§6Click Combo:§r §d§lRIGHT§r-§d§lLEFT§r-§d§lRIGHT

§7Construct a §nTurret§7 infront of you, which will 
shoot at enemies within it's radius every §f1.5s§7. 

Your §nTurret§7 has §f30%§7 of your max hp, 

§b✺ §7Mana Cost: §f40
§c⚔ §7Total Damage: §f60% §8(of your DPS)
   §8(§6✣ §8Damage: 40%)
   §8(§e✦ §8Thunder: 20%)
§3☀ §7Area of Effect: §f12 Blocks §7(Circle-Shaped)

2.name: §lNailgun Proficiency I
2.description:
§7Improve your §nMain Attack§7's damage
and range when using a Nailgun.

§c⚔ §7Main Attack Damage: §f+5%
§a➼ §7Main Attack Range: §f+2 Blocks

§c⚔ §7Total Damage: §f+20% §8(of your DPS)

   §8(§2✤ §8Earth: 10%)

5.description:
§6Click Combo: §d§l§d§lRIGHT§7-§d§lRIGHT§7-§d§lRIGHT

§7Place a §nLaunch Pad§7 at your feet, launching you in the
direction you're moving

The §nLaunch Pad§7 has a total of §f10%§7 of your max hp.

§b✺ §7Mana Cost: §f25

6.name: §lForced Impacts

§7Your §nMain Attack§7 gains extra range and will knock
back enemies.

§3☀ §7Area of Effect: §f+2 Blocks §7(Circle-Shaped)

7.name: §lBrilliant Engineering
7.description:
§7Increase the maximum hp of §nTurret§7 by §f5%§7 

Gain §f+5%§7 Walkspeed

8.name: §lCheaper Launch Pad I
8.description:
§7Reduce the mana cost of §nLaunch Pad

§b✺ §7Mana Cost: §f-5

9.name: §a§lProjector
9.description:
§6Click Combo:§r §d§lRIGHT§f-§d§lRIGHT§f-§d§lLEFT

§7Construct a §nProjector§7 which damages enemies within
a short radius every §f0.8s§7.

The §nProjector§7 has a total of §f35%§7 of your max hp.

§b✺ §7Mana Cost: §f40
§c⚔ §7Total Damage: §f90% §8(of your DPS)
   §8(§6✣ §8Damage: 50%)
   §8(§b✽ §8Water: 20%)
   §8(§e✦ §8Thunder: 20%)
§3☀ §7Area of Effect: §f6 Blocks §7(Circle-Shaped)

10.description:
§6Click Combo:§r §d§lRIGHT§f-§d§lLEFT§f-§d§lLEFT

§7Repairs Constructs and damages enemies around you.
§7Constructs will be repaired by §f15%§7 of your max hp.
§8(2s cooldown on repairs, per construct)

§b✺ §7Mana Cost: §f25
§a➼ §7Range: §f7 Blocks
§c⚔ §7Total Damage: §f80% §8(of your DPS)

   §8(§f❋ §8Air: 30%)

11.description:
§7Increase your base damage
from all Air attacks.

§f❋ §7Air Damage: §f+3-4

12.name: §lEarth Mastery
12.description:
§7Increase your base damage
from all Earth attacks.

§2✤ §7Earth Damage: §f+2-4

§7Whenever any of your Constructs break, create an

§7§n§nTurret§7 shots will now ricochet up to §f3§7 enemies,
Every ricochet reduces the damage by §f50%.

21.name: §c§lOverheat
21.description:
§7Every §f5th§7 attack from your §nTurret§7 grants §f1 §bEmber §4✹§7
§8(Max 3 Embers)

§7§nRepair§7 will consume §f1 §bEmber §4✹§7 to grant all nearby
Constructs §bBlazing §c§6⚘§7, however will no longer be

Constructs with §bBlazing §c§6⚘§7 will have a §f50%§7 faster

If a ally receives a fatal strike within the light,

§7
Hitting a enemy with §cTarget ➽§7 will increase the

§eRadiant Blessings ✧§7 are instantly reconstructed,

§nProjector§7 becomes a §nBarricade§7 with §f10%§7 of your

75.name: §a§lWeapon Information
75.description:
§7Mechanics unlike other classes, stick to using more 
modern equipment.

§fNailgun§7 :

Nailguns fire out an extremely fast projectile, 
that can't pierce enemies. Just imagine a bow 
and wand combined.

Their average dps are between bows and daggers.

§a➼ §7Range: §f6 Blocks

76.name: §a§lClass / Archetype Information
76.description:
§fMechanic §7:

§7Base resistance §f80%
§7Weapon - §fNailgun

§fArchetypes : 

§bParagon §7- High dps, Burst, Vulnerable.
§fArchon §7- Support, Builds up over time.
§6Strategist §7- Positioning and Spatial awareness
